notes.title: Supporting Information Available
notes.p:
The Supporting Information is available free of charge on the ACS Publications website at DOI: 10.1021/acsomega.9b02655.
Computational details, detailed atomic structures and band structures of V 2Se 9 and Nb 2Se 9, partial orbital analysis, and optimized structures of bulk and SCACs V 2Se 9 ( PDF)
